attributes.action: Keep F1 on Free to Air TV, bring premier league and cricket too!
attributes.additional_details:
Sick and tired of having to pay for Sky Sports or simply don't have the money at all during a recession?

sign the petition keep some of the sports on free to air tv!

Football (some premier league games are needed
)
Cricket (the boost the ashes in 2005 has been lost)

Wimbledon (never should ever be lost)

f1 needs to be fully retained, such a big f1 footprint in the UK (most of the teams are here and need future drivers and engineers)
